name: Jellyfish - Agency
description: Jellyfish unique, decade-long, multi-region Google partnership delivers across GMP, Cloud, and Training. We’re a Salesforce Consulting Partner, and one of the industry’s most extensively certified teams across Amazon. We can help you unlock your full potential across Meta technologies across the globe. Including training, creative, paid social, and analytics
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Your Platform to Perform
ShortDescription: Jellyfish is a new kind of marketing performance company for the platform world
enhanced_description: Jellyfish is a new kind of marketing performance company for the platform world. As a Salesforce Consulting Partner with a unique, decade-long, multi-region Google partnership delivering across GMP, Cloud, and Training, they also boast one of the industry’s most extensively certified teams across Amazon and expertise in Meta technologies (including training, creative, paid social, and analytics). Specializing in Learning and Development, Jellyfish offers Training eLearning software and Learning Experience Systems (LXPs) to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency, investing in proprietary technology to provide comprehensive navigation for companies.
key_use_cases: Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency
Designing and deploying Learning Experience Systems (LXPs)
Providing consulting services for Salesforce platform optimization and training
Offering consulting services for Google platform (GMP, Cloud) optimization and training
Delivering consulting services for Amazon platform optimization and training
Providing training, creative, paid social, and analytics services for Meta technologies
Offering strategic guidance and navigation for companies utilizing digital platforms
competitive_advantages: One of the industry’s most extensively certified teams across Amazon
Global reach and expertise across major digital platforms (Google, Salesforce, Amazon, Meta)
implementation_scenarios: Development and deployment of custom e-learning content
Setup and configuration of Learning Experience Systems (LXPs)
Strategic guidance and training delivery services
technology_stack: Meta technologies (training, creative, paid social, analytics tools)
roi_benefits: Optimized utilization of major digital platforms (Google, Salesforce, Amazon, Meta)
